description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Planning: Collaborate with RM/TL/EFSC/SFSC/FSC in planning sales & training activities including OB, BOP, GP, Meeting, Event …in the assigned Bank Partners on monthly basis.
              
              - Execution: Deploy the planned sales & training activities in the assigned Bank Partners to achieve projected sales targets including APE, Recruitment & Active ratio.
              
              - Supervision & Management: Supervise & manage sales performance in the assigned Bank Partners and sales team in terms of APE, recruitment, active ratio & compliance,
              
              - Training & Development: Train & develop the agency force including: RM/TL and sales team in accordance with the career path in the assigned Bank Partners.
              
              - Internal & external relationships: Maintain solid & effective collaboration STD/DOS/OP/NBUW/COMPLIANCE and Bank Partners.
              
              - Others: assigned by Head of Bancassurance from time to time.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Bachelor or higher Degree preferably in Economics, Business Administration, Marketing, Insurance
              
              - At least 2 year experience working as sales supervisor preferably in insurance, FCMG or foreign-invested financial companies
              
              - Additional management training experience is an advantage.
              
              - Excellent presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills
              
              - Competent in interpersonal / communication / negotiation/ motivation skills
              
              - Competent in analytical and problem solving skill
              
              - Competent in planning, organizing skills
              
              - Good at Insurance industry knowledge
              
              - Good at Sales Management & marketing principles
              
              * Advantage:
              
              - Life insurance knowledge
              
              - Excellent English/ VNs written and speaking skills;
              
              - Having vast personal networking
              
              - Familiar with PC literate, Excel, Word, and Power Point
              
              * Job’s attributes:
              
              - Mature, confident, sociable
              
              - Customer service-oriented
              
              - Self-starter, motivated and independent
              
              - Willing to work overtime & travel
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
